column4: i installed ubuntu about 1 week ago and yesterday i deleted the partition due to problems that i had wit the os and today when i tried to boot my pc i got this grub error 22 and now im not able to boot to windows vista sum 1 plz hlp
boot from xp install cd, get into recovery console, issue the commands fixboot and fixmbr
then vista should have a similar recovery console, google on how to get in it
will reinstalling boot loader affect my files?
ok let me google but wat should i google for should i type how to repair boot sector in vista srry its that im new to this
you have a vista cd/dvd or a recovery cd/dvd?
cause the latter doesnt have recovery options
i have a dell vista dvd
wat do u mean by latter
former and latter, the 1st and the 2nd
i have a vista dvd is that ok?
dell usually gives recovery cds, so it may not work
no they gave me a full windows vista installation dvd just in case
